oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Green manures as winter cover crops enhance soil improvement and weed regulation in crop rotation
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Talgre, Liina
Eremeev, Viacheslav
Sanchez de Cima, Diego
Tein, Berit
Reintam, Endla
Matt, Darja
Luik, Anne
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Soil quality
Soil biology
Composting and manuring
Crop husbandry
Soil
Weed management
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The aim of this research was to explain the effect of different green manures as winter cover crops and their combination with cattle manure on soil properties, weeds and crop yields in five-field crop rotation experiment of three different organic cropping systems.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Talgre, Liina; Eremeev, Viacheslav; Sanchez de Cima, Diego; Tein, Berit; Reintam, Endla; Matt, Darja and Luik, Anne (2014) Green manures as winter cover crops enhance soil improvement and weed regulation in crop rotation. Poster at: TILMAN-ORG project meeting in Lyon, France, Lyon, France, 25.-27.06.2014.
